name: Kause
description: Discord bot made to turn home server on and off

name: TKBasisNAMonthly
description: Monthly calculations of weather data for the North Atlantic
text:
An application made for DMI (Danish Meteorological Institute) as an intern.
The app was made as a replacement for an older app and rewritten from scratch.

It runs once a hour on a DMI server and pulls daily weather values, for multiple parameters, in order to calculate monthly weather values.

Written in Java and manipulates data from PostgreSQL database.
The codebase is proprietary and can not be displayed here.
